title: Where can I ask for help with recovering a skin that vanished?
body:
My SKT Zyra skin seems to have vanished from my account. I know I bought it at last years Worlds Event, and I've played with it a few times. 
I went to select it for a game earlier, and it's gone. I don't know what category it would fall under. Please help.

replies.body: Hmmmmmm after looking over your account history it looks like someone went back and forth refunding and buying that skin over and over. If that wasn't you who did that, I would *strongly* recommend changing your password and reaching out to our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). You'll be able to verify yourself with some basic account history questions and then they can reverse any damage a hacker might have done.
I'm fairly sure I didn't do that, so I'll change my password right away. Thank you.
